channel.title: Adding items to shops
channel.description:
Hi,
The subjects says it all.
How would I add items to shops, like if I spawned a bunch of npc shops in one area, and I want to add better items to them. How would I do that?
I'm using cheezscape update 80 and running windows 7 64 bit.
P.S.
My other problem hasn't been solved yet. My character won't save in cheezscape when I log out, but it does save when the server auto saves it. Is their some way to make sure my character is saved each time I log out?

item.title: Adding items to shops
item.dc:creator: @vinayak vinayak
item.description:
@vinayak wrote:

Still havent fixed the character save, but I have another question.

How do I make a starter pack for the player when a new account is created?

I went to player.java and searched up for player equipment, and put an item id next to each statement.

When I saved and recompiled, nothing happened.

I didn’t think this question would need a new thread.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding items to shops
item.dc:creator: @Shorty626 Shorty626
item.description:
@Shorty626 wrote:

Its going to be somewhere in the player handler thread thats where you’ll most want to look.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding items to shops
item.dc:creator: @vinayak vinayak
item.description:
@vinayak wrote:

But the server is able to auto save after about 30 seconds of playing.

I’m not sure, but it doesn’t seem to be in playersave.java, because i don’t see any code requiring directories.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding items to shops
item.dc:creator: @Shorty626 Shorty626
item.description:
@Shorty626 wrote:

Sorry I must have overlooked that part. Maybe something in your source is pointing to the wrong directory for writing the character files, Possibly a location that does not exist is why it may be giving you the error.

Read full topic

Yes, as I said in my first post, it’s windows 7 64 bit.

@Shorty626 wrote:

item.title: Adding items to shops
item.dc:creator: @vinayak vinayak
item.description:
@vinayak wrote:

I gave full control, and enabled all permissions to the folder, but to no avail.

Character still won’t save.

The same message comes, could not save for or in this case, vinayak.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding items to shops
item.dc:creator: @Shorty626 Shorty626
item.description:
@Shorty626 wrote:

Read the article. Pay close attention to the first table, It explains what each permission grants the user. I am not going to give answers, But I will point people in the right direction.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding items to shops
item.dc:creator: @vinayak vinayak
item.description:
@vinayak wrote:

nbk, thanks, I got the shops to work.

Shorty, to make the characters save, I have to give full control over the folder?

Or do I have to do something else?

Kinda confused.

Read full topic

to add items to shop go to cig find shops and it will say the shop name and the id codes in it

item.title: Adding items to shops
item.dc:creator: @Shorty626 Shorty626
item.description:
@Shorty626 wrote:

http://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/bb727008.aspx

Thats why your character files wont save.

The subjects says it all.
